Class FileUtilityMethods

java.lang.Object
de.gnwi.mfsim.model.util.FileUtilityMethods
public class FileUtilityMethods extends Object
File utility methods to be instantiated

Achim Zielesny

  • Method Details

    • renameDirectory

      public boolean renameDirectory(String aDirectoryPath, String aNewDirectoryName)
      Renames directory. If renamed directory already exists an appendix is generated in the form of "_V1", "_V2" etc.
      Parameters:
      aDirectoryPath - Full path of directory
      aNewDirectoryName - New name of directory (WITHOUT path information)
      Returns:
      true: Operation was successful, false: Operation failed

    • renameSingleFile

      public boolean renameSingleFile(String aFilePathname, String newFileName)
      Renames single file
      Parameters:
      aFilePathname - Full pathname of file
      newFileName - New name of file (WITHOUT path information)
      Returns:
      true: Operation was successful, false: Operation failed

    • copyNonExistingSingleFile

      public boolean copyNonExistingSingleFile(String aSourceFilePathname, String aDestinationFilePathname)
      Copies specified file to specified destination if file does NOT exist in specified destination. NOTE: File will not be copied if specified destination pathname already exists. Then true is returned.
      Parameters:
      aSourceFilePathname - Full pathname of source (may be null or empty then false is returned)
      aDestinationFilePathname - Full pathname of destination (may be null or empty then false is returned)
      Returns:
      true: Operation was successful, false: Operation failed

    • copyNonExistingFilesIntoDirectory

      public boolean copyNonExistingFilesIntoDirectory(String aDirectorySourcePath, String aDirectoryDestinationPath)
      Copies all non-existing files and sub-directories of specified directory into destination directory
      Parameters:
      aDirectorySourcePath - Path of source directory
      aDirectoryDestinationPath - Path of destination directory
      Returns:
      true: Operation was successful, false: Operation failed

    • copyPrefixDirectories

      public int copyPrefixDirectories(String aDirectorySourcePath, String aPrefix, String aDirectoryDestinationPath)
      Copies all directories that start with specified prefix from source to destination. If a directory with the same name already exists in destination NOTHING is copied.
      Parameters:
      aDirectorySourcePath - Path of source directory
      aPrefix - Prefix of directories to be copied
      aDirectoryDestinationPath - Path of destination directory
      Returns:
      Number of directories copied

    • copyDirectory

      public boolean copyDirectory(String aDirectoryPath, String aDestinationPath)
      Copies directory (and all sub-directories) to destination.
      Parameters:
      aDirectoryPath - Full path of directory
      aDestinationPath - Full path of destination directory the specified directory is copied to
      Returns:
      true: Operation was successful, false: Operation failed

    • copyAndDeleteDirectory

      public boolean copyAndDeleteDirectory(String aDirectorySourcePath, String aDestinationPath)
      Copies source directory (and all sub-directories) to destination and deletes source directory
      Parameters:
      aDirectorySourcePath - Path of source directory
      aDestinationPath - Path of destination directory
      Returns:
      true: Operation was successful, false: Operation failed

    • copyIntoDirectory

      public boolean copyIntoDirectory(String aDirectorySourcePath, String aDirectoryDestinationPath)
      Copies all files and sub-directories of specified source directory into destination directory
      Parameters:
      aDirectorySourcePath - Path of source directory
      aDirectoryDestinationPath - Path of destination directory
      Returns:
      true: Operation was successful, false: Operation failed

    • copySingleFile

      public boolean copySingleFile(String aSourceFilePathname, String aDestinationFilePathname)
      Copies specified file to specified destination. NOTE: File will not be copied if specified destination pathname already exists. Then true is returned.
      Parameters:
      aSourceFilePathname - Full pathname of source (may be null or empty then false is returned)
      aDestinationFilePathname - Full pathname of destination (may be null or empty then false is returned)
      Returns:
      true: Operation was successful, false: Operation failed

    • copyAndDeleteSingleFile

      public boolean copyAndDeleteSingleFile(String aSourceFilePathname, String aDestinationFilePathname)
      Copies single file to destination and deletes source file. Source file may be renamed if filename of destination pathname is different from filename of source pathname.
      Parameters:
      aSourceFilePathname - Pathname of source file
      aDestinationFilePathname - Pathname of destination file
      Returns:
      true: Operation was successful, false: Operation failed

    • copySingleFileToDirectory

      public boolean copySingleFileToDirectory(String aSourceFilePathname, String aDirectoryDestinationPath)
      Copies specified file to specified directory. NOTE: File will not be copied if specified file in specified directory already exists. Then false is returned.
      Parameters:
      aSourceFilePathname - Full pathname of source (may be null or empty then false is returned)
      aDirectoryDestinationPath - Full path of destination directory (may be null or empty then false is returned)
      Returns:
      true: Operation was successful, false: Operation failed

    • copyStream

      public boolean copyStream(InputStream anInputStream, OutputStream anOutputStream, boolean aCloseStreamFlag)
      Copies file in inputstream to outputstream
      Parameters:
      anInputStream - Input stream (may be null then false is returned)
      anOutputStream - File output stream (may be null then false is returned)
      aCloseStreamFlag - true: Streams are closed after operation, false: Streams are not closed after operation
      Returns:
      true: Operation was successful, false: Operation failed

    • createDirectory

      public boolean createDirectory(File aPathSpecification)
      Creates directory and all non-existent ancestor directories if necessary
      Parameters:
      aPathSpecification - File with path specification
      Returns:
      true: Directory already existed or was successfully created, false: Otherwise

    • createUniqueDirectoryWithDateTimeEnding

      public DirectoryInformation createUniqueDirectoryWithDateTimeEnding(String aDirectoryDestinationPath, String aDirectoryPrefix)
      Creates a unique directory in destination path with specified date-time-ending. NOTE: This method should NOT be called from parallelised threads due to passed timestamp and small time difference between check of already existing directory and creation of directory.
      Parameters:
      aDirectoryDestinationPath - Destination path for unique directory to be created in
      aDirectoryPrefix - Prefix for unique directory name (ending is date-time string)
      Returns:
      Directory information or null if unique directory could not be created

    • getUniqueTemporaryDirectoryPath

      public String getUniqueTemporaryDirectoryPath()
      Returns full pathname of new unique temporary directory. NOTE: New unique temporary directory is NOT created!
      Returns:
      Full pathname of new unique temporary directory

      Parameters:
      aDirectoryPath - Path of directory to be cleared (may be null or empty then false is returned)
      Returns:
      true: Operation was successful, false: Operation failed

      Returns:
      true: Operation was successful, false: Operation failed

      aSourceFilePathname - Pathname of source file
      aDestinationFilePathname - Pathname of destination file
      Returns:
      true: Operation was successful, false: Operation failed

    • extractDirectoryFromZipFile

      public boolean extractDirectoryFromZipFile(String aPath, String aZipFilePathname)
      Extracts directory (with all files and sub directories) from ZIP file that was created with Utility.copyDirectoryToZipFile()
      Parameters:
      aPath - Full path for directory to extract (must exist, otherwise false is returned)
      aZipFilePathname - Full path and name of ZIP file (must exist, otherwise false is returned)
      Returns:
      True: Operation was successful, false: Otherwise

    • getDirectoryNameFromZipFile

      public String getDirectoryNameFromZipFile(String aZipFilePathname)
      Returns directory name from ZIP file that was created with Utility.copyDirectoryToZipFile()
      Parameters:
      aZipFilePathname - Full path and name of ZIP file (must exist, otherwise false is returned)
      Returns:
      Directory name from ZIP file or null

    • getSingleFileFromZipFile

      public boolean getSingleFileFromZipFile(String aZipFilePathname, String aSingleFilename, String aDestinationPathname)
      Returns (first occurrence of) single file from ZIP file that was created with Utility.copyDirectoryToZipFile()
      Parameters:
      aZipFilePathname - Full path and name of ZIP file (must exist, otherwise false is returned)
      aSingleFilename - File name (without path) of single file
      aDestinationPathname - Full path and name for destination of the single file (not allowed to already exist: If file already exists false is returned)
      Returns:
      True: Operation was successful, false: Otherwise

    • getSingleDirectoryFromZipFile

      public boolean getSingleDirectoryFromZipFile(String aZipFilePathname, String aDirectoryPrefix, String aDestinationPath)
      Returns single directory with specified prefix from ZIP file that was created with Utility.copyDirectoryToZipFile(). NOTE: The directory prefix must be unique in all file pathnames of ZIP file.
      Parameters:
      aZipFilePathname - Full path and name of ZIP file (must exist, otherwise false is returned)
      aDirectoryPrefix - name (without path) of single file
      aDestinationPath - Full path for destination of single directory (not allowed to already exist: If directory already exists false is returned)
      Returns:
      True: Operation was successful, false: Otherwise

    • getSingleDirectoryNameFromZipFile

      public String getSingleDirectoryNameFromZipFile(String aZipFilePathname, String aDirectoryPrefix)
      Returns single directory name with specified prefix from ZIP file that was created with Utility.copyDirectoryToZipFile(). NOTE: The directory prefix must be unique in all file pathnames of ZIP file.
      Parameters:
      aZipFilePathname - Full path and name of ZIP file (must exist, otherwise false is returned)
      aDirectoryPrefix - name (without path) of single file
      Returns:
      Full directory name that corresponds to specified prefix or null if prefix could not be found

    • copyDirectoryToZipFile

      public boolean copyDirectoryToZipFile(String aDirectoryPath, String aZipFilePathname)
      Copies directory to ZIP file
      Parameters:
      aDirectoryPath - Full path of directory (must exist, otherwise false is returned)
      aZipFilePathname - Full path and name of ZIP file (is NOT allowed to already exist, otherwise false is returned)
      Returns:
      True: Operation was successful, false: Otherwise

    • readStringArrayFromFile

      public String[] readStringArrayFromFile(String aSourceFilePathname, String aCommentLinePrefix)
      Reads string array from file
      Parameters:
      aSourceFilePathname - Full pathname of source (may be null/empty then null is returned)
      aCommentLinePrefix - Prefix of comment line (may be null/empty)
      Returns:
      String array or null if string array could not be read

    • readStringArrayPartFromFile

      public String[] readStringArrayPartFromFile(String aSourceFilePathname, String aCommentLinePrefix, String aSectionTag)
      Reads string array from specified section of file
      Parameters:
      aSourceFilePathname - Full pathname of source (may be null then null is returned)
      aCommentLinePrefix - Prefix of comment line to ignore (may be null/empty)
      aSectionTag - Section tag (if null/empty then null is returned)
      Returns:
      String array from specified section of file or null if string array could not be read

    • readDefinedStringArrayFromFile

      public String[] readDefinedStringArrayFromFile(String aSourceFilePathname)
      Reads string array from file. NOTE: First line must be size of string array.
      Parameters:
      aSourceFilePathname - Full pathname of source (may be null then null is returned)
      Returns:
      String array or null if string array could not be read

    • writeStringArrayToFile

      public boolean writeStringArrayToFile(String[] aStringArray, String aDestinationFilePathname)
      Writes string array to file. NOTE: If destination pathname already exists nothing is done.
      Parameters:
      aStringArray - String array (may be null then false is returned)
      aDestinationFilePathname - Full pathname of destination (may be null then false is returned)
      Returns:
      true: Operation was successful, false: Operation failed

    • writeDefinedStringArrayToFile

      public boolean writeDefinedStringArrayToFile(String[] aStringArray, String aDestinationFilePathname)
      Writes string array to file. First line is the number of lines. NOTE: If destination pathname already exists nothing is done.
      Parameters:
      aStringArray - String array (may be null then false is returned)
      aDestinationFilePathname - Full pathname of destination (may be null then false is returned)
      Returns:
      true: Operation was successful, false: Operation failed

    • readJaggedStringArrayFromFile

      public String[][] readJaggedStringArrayFromFile(String aSourceFilePathname, String aCommentLinePrefix)
      Reads jagged string array from file. Each line is splitted after one or more whitespace characters.
      Parameters:
      aSourceFilePathname - Full pathname of source (may be null then null is returned)
      aCommentLinePrefix - Prefix of comment line (may be null/empty)
      Returns:
      Jagged string array or null if jagged string array could not be read

    • readJaggedStringArrayPartFromFile

      public String[][] readJaggedStringArrayPartFromFile(String aSourceFilePathname, String aCommentLinePrefix, String aSectionTag)
      Reads jagged string array from specified section of file. Each line is splitted after one or more whitespace characters.
      Parameters:
      aSourceFilePathname - Full pathname of source (may be null then null is returned)
      aCommentLinePrefix - Prefix of comment line to ignore (may be null/empty)
      aSectionTag - Section tag (if null/empty then null is returned)
      Returns:
      Jagged string array from specified section of file or null if jagged string array could not be read

    • readStringListFromFile

      public LinkedList<String> readStringListFromFile(String aSourceFilePathname, String aCommentLinePrefix)
      Reads string list from file
      Parameters:
      aSourceFilePathname - Full pathname of source (may be null/empty then null is returned)
      aCommentLinePrefix - Prefix of comment line (may be null/empty)
      Returns:
      String list or null if string array could not be read

    • getResourceInputStream

      public InputStream getResourceInputStream(Class<?> aClass, String aResourceName)
      Returns a resource input stream
      Parameters:
      aClass - A class with a resource relative to it (may be null then null is returned)
      aResourceName - Resource name relative to class (may be null or empty then null is returned)
      Returns:
      Resource input stream or null if none were found

    • copyResourceToDestination

      public boolean copyResourceToDestination(Class<?> aClass, String aResourceName, String aDestinationFilePathname)
      Copies resource to destination if destination does not already exist.
      Parameters:
      aClass - A class with a resource relative to it (may be null then false is returned)
      aResourceName - Resource name relative to class (may be null or empty then false is returned)
      aDestinationFilePathname - Pathname for destination (may be null or empty then false is returned)
      Returns:
      true: Operation was successful, false: Operation failed

    • hasResource

      public boolean hasResource(Class<?> aClass, String aResourceName)
      Checks if defined resource exists
      Parameters:
      aClass - A class with a resource relative to it (may be null then false is returned)
      aResourceName - Resource name relative to class (may be null or empty then false is returned)
      Returns:
      true: Resource exists, false: Otherwise

    • copyEncryptedResourceToDestination

      public boolean copyEncryptedResourceToDestination(Class<?> aClass, String aResourceName, String aDestinationFilePathname, byte[] aKeyByteArray)
      Copies encrypted resource to destination if destination does not already exist.
      Parameters:
      aClass - A class with a resource relative to it (may be null then false is returned)
      aResourceName - Resource name relative to class (may be null or empty then false is returned)
      aDestinationFilePathname - Pathname for destination (may be null or empty then false is returned)
      aKeyByteArray - Byte array with key
      Returns:
      true: Operation was successful, false: Operation failed

    • writeSingleStringToTextFile

      public boolean writeSingleStringToTextFile(String aString, String aDestinationFilePathname)
      Writes single string to file. NOTE: If destination file pathname already exists nothing is done.
      Parameters:
      aString - String (may be null/empty then false is returned)
      aDestinationFilePathname - Full pathname of destination (may be null then false is returned)
      Returns:
      true: Operation was successful, false: Operation failed

    • readTextFileIntoSingleString

      public String readTextFileIntoSingleString(String aSourcePathname)
      Reads a text file into a single string
      Parameters:
      aSourcePathname - Full pathname of the text file to be read
      Returns:
      The string representation of the content of the text file or null if nothing could be read

    • getFilenameWithoutExtension

      public String getFilenameWithoutExtension(String aFilename)
      Returns filename without extension, e.g. "Test.txt" returns "Test"
      Parameters:
      aFilename - Filename with extension
      Returns:
      Filename without extension or aFilename if aFilename does not have an extension

    • getExtensionOfFilename

      public String getExtensionOfFilename(String aFilename)
      Returns extension of filename, e.g. "Test.txt" returns ".txt"
      Parameters:
      aFilename - Filename with extension
      Returns:
      Extension of filename or null/empty string if filename does not have an extension (if filename was null then null is returned, if filename was empty than empty string is returned)

    • getIncrementedFilename

      public String getIncrementedFilename(String aFilename, int anIncrement)
      Returns incremented filename, e.g. filename = "Test.txt" and anIncrement = 3 returns "Test_3.txt"
      Parameters:
      aFilename - File name
      anIncrement - Increment
      Returns:
      Incremented filename or null if none could be created

    • getMaximumImageNumberOfImageDirectoryForMovies

      public int getMaximumImageNumberOfImageDirectoryForMovies(String anImageDirectoryPathForMovies)
      Returns maximum image number of image directory path for movies
      Parameters:
      anImageDirectoryPathForMovies - Full image directory path for movies
      Returns:
      Maximum image number of movie directory or -1 if none could be detected
